question: What is the deduced type of 'param' inside the function f() when f() is called ?
code: template<typename T> void f(T& param); int value = 5; f(value);

question: What is the deduced type of 'param' inside the function f() when f() is called ?
code: template<typename T> void f(const T& param); int value = 5; f(value);
